args.natural_language_statement:
Let f_n : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be Riemann integrable and suppose f_n ‚Üí f uniformly on [a,b]. Then f is Riemann integrable and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_a^b f_n.

Formalize this in Lean4 (import Mathlib) as a theorem. End the statement with := by sorry.

retrieved_examples.nl: If f_n ‚Üí f uniformly on [a,b] and each f_n is Riemann integrable, then f is Riemann integrable and the integrals converge to the integral of f.
retrieved_examples.lean:
import Mathlib

theorem uniform_limit_riemann {a b : ‚Ñù} (h : a < b) {f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {f_lim : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (h_int : ‚àÄ n, Riemann.integrable_on (f n) (Icc a b)) (h_unif : TendstoUniformlyOn (fun n x => f n x) atTop f_lim (Icc a b)) : Riemann.integrable_on f_lim (Icc a b) ‚àß Tendsto (fun n => Riemann.integral (f n) a b) atTop (ùìù (Riemann.integral f_lim a b)) := by sorry

history.content: Let $f_n \colon [a,b] \to \mathbb{R}$ be Riemann integrable and suppose $f_n \to f$ uniformly on $[a,b]$. Then $f$ is Riemann integrable and $\int_a^b f = \lim_{n\to\infty} \int_a^b f_n .$

Here are some similar examples for context:

NL: If f_n ‚Üí f uniformly on [a,b] and each f_n is Riemann integrable, then f is Riemann integrable and the integrals converge to the integral of f.
Lean:
```lean
import Mathlib

theorem uniform_limit_riemann {a b : ‚Ñù} (h : a < b) {f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {f_lim : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} (h_int : ‚àÄ n, Riemann.integrable_on (f n) (Icc a b)) (h_unif : TendstoUniformlyOn (fun n x => f n x) atTop f_lim (Icc a b)) : Riemann.integrable_on f_lim (Icc a b) ‚àß Tendsto (fun n => Riemann.integral (f n) a b) atTop (ùìù (Riemann.integral f_lim a b)) := by sorry
```

args.content:
import Mathlib

open scoped Classical
open MeasureTheory Metric Set Filter TopologicalSpace
open scoped Classical Topology Filter ENNReal Interval NNReal
open Asymptotics

/-- Let f_n : [a,b] ‚Üí ‚Ñù be Riemann integrable and suppose f_n ‚Üí f uniformly on [a,b].
    Then f is Riemann integrable and ‚à´_a^b f = lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} ‚à´_a^b f_n. -/
theorem riemann_integrable_of_tendsto_uniformly {a b : ‚Ñù} (h : a < b) {f : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {f_lim : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù}
    (h_int : ‚àÄ n, Riemann.integrable_on (f n) (Icc a b))
    (h_unif : TendstoUniformlyOn (fun n x => f n x) atTop f_lim (Icc a b)) :
    Riemann.integrable_on f_lim (Icc a b) ‚àß
      Tendsto (fun n => ‚à´ (x : ‚Ñù) in a..b, f n x) atTop (ùìù (‚à´ (x : ‚Ñù) in a..b, f_lim x)) := by sorry
